subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Justine Henin, the top female tennis player in the world, defeated Venus Williams to advance to face Svetlana Kuznetsova in the finals of the United States Open.
snippet: Justine Henin, the top female tennis player in the world, defeated Venus Williams to advance to face Svetlana Kuznetsova in the finals of the United States Open.
